website_summaries.verdict: A plushy comforter that comes with all the matching pieces you need to complete your twin XL bed.
pros: Made of soft material that's breathable, making it suitable for year-round use
Includes a comforter with an attractive box-stitch pattern
Also comes with a fitted sheet, flat sheet, pillow case, and sham
cons: Comforter material is on the thin side

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the cost!
customer_reviews.text: So far we love this! The comforter is so soft and fluffy. The sheets fit our sleep number bed with the adjustable flex head really well, and are soft. Compared to $200 for sleep number sheets this is an amazing deal! Update: we've had this set a year now and it's still in great condition! Comforter is still fluffy and no piling on it or the sheets. Hubby did snap one of the elastic bands on the fitted sheet(it might be only adjustable versions that have these) but I'm pretty sure he was man handling it, he sucks at changing sheets!
customer_reviews.author: TrishaChristine

customer_reviews.title: Good for college
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dorm room in college as it requires XL twin bed sheets. It’s so soft! The color and texture of it was really nice! Would recommend for incoming college students instead of paying for the more expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Mari

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited for this to come as I’m redecorating my room I finally get everything to how I want I wash my sheets n go to put them on my bed n they don’t fit at all. I have a queen ordered a queen. I love the comforter do not want to return just want the right sheet n I contacted them n they said it was outside of the 30 day policy but if my items r unwashed they will return them!!! So who puts new sheets on their bed wout washing them. ?? Extreamly disappointing n now I’m stuck with sheets that don’t fit and have to go spend more money now on sheets. So buyers beware!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Ferst

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Georgia summer
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed set!. We live in southern Georgia so I didnt want anything too thick. This is just right in the middle so I can blast the a.c and still be comfortable. The comforter is not bulky but it has slight weight to it which makes you feel all snuggled but its thin enough you dont sweat to death. The sheets were so much softer than I expected and I couldn't be happier with the quality of both items. I've had no issues with tears or strings or anything. No smell out of packaging either. Would definitely buy again if I ever needed to.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to size and dimensions
customer_reviews.text: Bought California King Size, it arrived in good condition, stitching was good, no tears or unstitched areas, Sheet set in separate packaging. Sheet set was California King, and fit as expected. Comforter was marked King/California King, it doesn't come very far over the foot of the bed and not very far down the side either. I would have preferred a bigger comforter. I should have looked at the dimensions more closely
customer_reviews.author: PAMark

customer_reviews.title: Great mid-range sheets and excellent comforter.
customer_reviews.text: I've definitely slept on better, but I've also slept on a lot worse. The sheets and pillowcases are thin (though adequate) and quite soft. The comforter is actually quite thiccc. It's not absurdly thick, but that's a good thing. It's not too thin nor too thick, and is perfect for anybody that keeps their house at a reasonable temperature. (59F to 73F) I wish the sheets and pillowcases were a bit thicker, but they are very soft and comfortable and I would still recommend these above other online-order microfiber sheet sets I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Wolffe

customer_reviews.title: Torn before even placing it in the bed!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about my bedding and then i get it all opened up and i find the blankets torn and i am scared to even wash it to put it on my bed. Hence the one star.
customer_reviews.author: Tedra Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Twin XL 5 Piece bed in a bag - Bare Home
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Entire set has tolerated very old machine washing well,.. so far. It's also being used on a hospital bed, so I was expecting it to tear relatively soon, with the sharp edges and many metal adjusting points it can get caught in. Can't complain, as I've never seen a twin set come with more than one pillow case, but wish they did, or at least give you an option to buy a matching one. Overall, quite satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Spike

customer_reviews.title: Soft & Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Feels wonderful to the touch. Soft and comfortable. Not real dressy, has a messy look which is what we expected. For college aged son's room. In person it is GREY! I don't know why curtain and bedding looks purple when we take a pic.
customer_reviews.author: S. French

customer_reviews.title: Must have comforter set if you get cold easily
customer_reviews.text: OH MY GOSH THIS BED SET IS COMFY!! So simple-looking yet elegant and sexy. Rich, vibrant, pitch black color. And WOW is the comforter warm!! It's perfect for me cuz I get cold real easily. The pockets on the fitted sheet are really deep. This review was written after one wash and two nights of sleep. I'm a bit of a wild sleeper but I didn't have to fix the fitted sheet at all like I normally have to. Very satisfied with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Check this as soon as you get it.
customer_reviews.text: Order this and when we took it out the bag once we got to my son school the sheets was not in there. It’s just the comforter and the pillow case in the pack.
customer_reviews.author: Calandra Gray

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: My son picked this out for his room and he is very pleased. He really liked the fact that the comforter and sheets came together. Bummer it didnt come with a bed skirt though... The material is soft and the comforter is perfect for both summer and winter. We ended up getting a gray set for our daughters room too.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Im really happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Im really happy with my purchase! Its comfy and warmmm. Gets me all cozy and sleepy just by looking at it!! Price worthy!!! And i got mine on time!!! Recommended! Id give 6stars out of five if possible! ❤️✨
customer_reviews.author: Shaira Samonte

customer_reviews.title: Top sheet has a hole in it out of the packaging. Packaging does not have a hole in it.
customer_reviews.text: Super soft, fits perfect. However, my top sheet has a hole in it. Found the hole as soon as I pulled it out of the package. Leaving a low review do to poor quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Super soft!
customer_reviews.text: The bedding is great! I ordered the split king light grey bedding! Its super soft, And warm! There were no holes or stains. I added extra pillows because I have an obsession with them. My boyfriend also enjoys the bedding. Perfect for what I wanted! The only disappointment is that with microfiber even water could damage it, which is really depressing for my wake up in a thirst for water sore throat panic. And water has already ruined a pillow case.
customer_reviews.author: Analisia Rosas

customer_reviews.title: Not my color!
customer_reviews.text: I received my package today, and while everything was packed tight and all materials are very soft, I’m very disappointed in the color. I wanted, and ordered, the black/black comforter set. However, I received a black comforter and a steel gray sheet set. Not black. I ordered these for the very reason that I could get BLACK sheets & a black comforter. Very disappointed. I didn’t receive them with time to send them back and replace them, but if I could have, I would have. Be warned. If you’re not flexible on color, you may want to shop elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter picked this out for her room. She's a teenager now and wanted a more grown up look to her room. I went over and helped her put the new bedding on her bed. The sheets feel wonderfully soft. Good quality. The comforter fit nicely and looked great! Would recommend to others and would purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: GrndmaNan

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this product. I've had it for a few month now and it's all still together and nothing has ripped. It is a bit larger than my mattress and that's the only problem I have for it. The pillow cases do fit the standard pillow. The whole set is very soft and durable. Best set I've gotten for the price. It did come with 2 pillow cases, a flat and fitted mattress case, and the comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: SUPER SOFT
customer_reviews.text: This set is soft beyond belief! I am really quite picky about the texture of sheets and I was a little nervous to buy without touching first. It is so warm and cozy. It will be used as a winter set, however because of that. I'm a cold sleeper and it's already getting too warm in May! It got super pilly the first few times we slept in it (after the initial out of the package washing) but the pills came out in the wash after that. I would definitely recommend as long as you have another option for when it gets warmer.
customer_reviews.author: B. Cox

customer_reviews.title: A MELTED mess!!
customer_reviews.text: We used this set for 2 weeks. At that 2 week mark, we washed and dried it. Everything was fine except for the comforter. The comforter MELTED in the dryer. We dried it on low heat and it still melted. I would not recommend this purchase to anyone unless you are okay with never washing your bed clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Hawk526

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, low price, great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, beautiful, soft, great customer service. This is the second purchase of this set. The first was for my college student. He loves it. Looks good, wears well, looks like much higher quality. Color is excellent. Purchased another set for our guest room because we love it so much. When I received my second set, a pillow sham was missing. I contacted the customer service and onw was sent to me immediately!! No hassle, no problems!! I was very impressed with the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: HizLady

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Greatness
customer_reviews.text: The comforter is great. It's super soft. The filling is smooth in texture. It's about medium warm. A good all season warmth. The sheets and pillow cases are OK. Soft but on the thinner side. That's not a problem for me though. Overall very happy with this set. Great price for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mentallo

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive 7 piece.
customer_reviews.text: As shown in the photo I only received a 5 piece set where as the description states a 7 piece set. I did not receive the 2 grey pillow shams as stated in the description. I contacted the seller to hopefully fix this mistake. The texture of them are soft which is great but I wish I received ALL items as it says, if not I would’ve never bought these items.
customer_reviews.author: Sareyrath

customer_reviews.title: Just about perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little iffy about ordering from this, because the price was so cheap for a Cali king set.. but I went ahead and did it anyway. It’s a little thinner than normal comforters would be, but not too thin, if that makes since. It works out perfect for us, because my husband sweats allot when he sleeps. As for the sheets, they seem to be a little on the small side, but once you get them on, that sheets not slipping off lol Anyway, 5 stars. Would buy again, but I don’t think I’ll have to for a while. 👌🏽
customer_reviews.author: Angel Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Soft and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Omg, words can not explain my comforter set... the material is so soft and soothing... I sleep very well. I'm not sure why issues everyone else had, and I'm not sure why negative comments were made... the comforter must be fluffed when it removed from the bag.. if you don't fluff it, it will be flat... to fluff it. You can shake it or place in the dryer on air dry... I may purchase additional sets in the future....
customer_reviews.author: KC Lil'

customer_reviews.title: Too small!!!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely does not fit a California King bed as it claims too, I don’t even think it would fit a regular king size bed. Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durability/stitching
customer_reviews.text: Comforter feels and looks great but it's already ripping apart and the cotton is coming out. Only after one wash. Also when I recieved the item there were a bunch of long threads that were hanging from the comforter. Like part of the stitching was missed or something. Maybe I just got a one in a million messed up comforter. I would like to keep it but I dont know how long this one will last. Even onlynowned it for about a week or so.
customer_reviews.author: Donte A.

customer_reviews.title: Good comforter but cheaply made sheet set.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this set an overall rating of 3 stars because the comforters were substantial in weight and the material seems to be of a better quality than the sheet set. The price for the comforters is reasonable. But the sheet sets are a different story. The sheets are made from a cheap and thin material. For such a high thread count I expected the sheets to feel thicker as I have other high TC sheets that are. I ordered white sheets but they have a pink tinge to them...subtle but enough to be noticed. The comforters made up for the pinkish sheets. Hope they hold up after regular use and multiple washes.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel in DC

customer_reviews.title: It is durable and soft. Fits the bed perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my daughter that is in college. It feels very soft and the comforter is light weight. The sheets are a lot softer then I expected. It's also a true black vs some other ones I looked at almost looked faded. We won't have it on her bed until this weekend but if my opinion changes I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: T Fleck

customer_reviews.title: ... set because of the cheap price but it had great reviews so I took the chance
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant to purchase this set because of the cheap price but it had great reviews so I took the chance. I absolutely LOVE this set! Very satisfied with the quality. The sheets are so soft and the comforter is perfect, not too thick not too thin. Would definitely buy again!! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Patrizz

customer_reviews.title: Great Value & Quality!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome bed set for the money! Very luxurious! I bought this set for my 4 year old’s bed and it is wayyyyyy nicer than I thought it would be. The comforter is super thick and plushy but he was able to use it year round. The sheets are soft and we haven’t had any pulls or holes in them. Highly recommend for adults or children.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssia Grakowsky

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I first bought Bare Home sheets for our bed. They are so soft and wash up incredibly well. We bought our son a queen sized bed and needed to buy him all new bedding because he had a double bed previously. He picked out the colors he wanted (gray sheets and a blue comforter) and he loves them! Very happy with my purchase. I would not hesitate to buy anything from Bare Home again! :)
customer_reviews.author: MIchele

customer_reviews.title: NO SHEET SET INCLUDED IN PACKAGE, do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: The description of this lies, IT DOES NOT INCLUDE A SHEET SET. Was a RIP OFF for just a comforter and a sham. We kept the comforter which seemed okay but not worth the $50 we spent. Save your money or look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love this bedding
customer_reviews.text: Super soft bedding and the comforter is so fluffy and cozy. I have washed it 4 times now and it has retained its comfort and fluffiness!!! Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Bethanie Moore

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I absolutely LOVE LOVE LOVE this comforter set. My expectations were much exceeded. The comforter is so soft and the perfect amount of weight. It definitely isn't super thin or light and isnt extremely heavy. Its that perfect in-between. Sheets are also fantastic quality.
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: THESE SHEETS ARE A LINT & HAIR MAGNET! GROSS!
customer_reviews.text: In the beginning, I loved this set. The comforter is a nice weight, the fabric of both it and the sheets are quite comfy. Then, my Hairy brother visited for a week. I have washed these sheets repeatedly, (5 times) and CANNOT GET THE HAIR OFF OF THEM! I have never seen anything like this! I even tried to vacuum them! For some reason, hair sticks to this fabric and will not come off. I cannot use these. How can I put a guest in this bed with short man hairs all over the sheets... gross!
customer_reviews.author: K. Casey

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this Bed in a Bag, in light/dark grey for my son's college dorm. It arrived several days earlier than expected. Upon arrival I opened it to inspect it. It looked well made and was super soft and lightweight. I then washed it (following washing instructions carefully) before packing it for him to take with him in a couple weeks. It washed very well and came out even softer. It seems like it will be very comfortable and warm. Love the color as well. Very pleased with this purchase. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: jamie wood

customer_reviews.title: Great comforter, horrible sheets
customer_reviews.text: The comforter is lovely, perfect and light weight. The sheets are horrible, these "ultra soft premium micro fiber" sheets 100% cheap polyester. SO DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie H

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: thought with this price point it would get me by for a while but would be junk. I was really surprised to see the quality of this item, it really caught me off guard. I have paid twice as much for some that are not even close to this good. I will be back for more as the wife changes room colors.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory J. Urban

customer_reviews.title: Fluffy & Comfortable. Love this set.
customer_reviews.text: I shopped a long time before I bought this Comforter. I wanted lots of fluff, warm but not heavy. This Comforter is perfect. Washed & dried perfectly too. The sheets were a perk. Soft and fit great on my California King. My husband was very pleased with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: it got cut up in the wash I have to now buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: fancypants

customer_reviews.title: Twin XL comforter - So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for college dorm and it arrived promptly, well packaged, and the note from the seller was a nice touch. Color was true to photo and I machine washed and dried it as instructed and it came out fine (another comparable comforter from another seller ripped a little bit at the very first washing.) Gave 4 stars instead of 5 because it has only been a few days and one washing, so hopefully it will hold for up for a couple years of washing and use. Also have not washed and used the sheets yet that it came with, since we had another set all ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Hodge

customer_reviews.title: I would like to receive my sheets.
customer_reviews.text: I sent a review. I did not receive the sheets. The Comforter is beautiful and nice. I would like to receive the sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Tedford

customer_reviews.title: It breathes well and is soft
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with this purchase. I am considering buying a second set. The comforter and sheets are soft. It breathes well. I often get too warm at night and kick the blankets off but I stopped doing that with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Jennefer Root

customer_reviews.title: Bad Choice
customer_reviews.text: I did not unpack the contents until about a week after delivery. I of course wanted to wash before putting on my bed. I have a front loading super capacity washer and I set on gentle cycle to wash the comforter. The comforter came apart at the seams, the stuffing was all over the washer and there were holes in different places on the item. Very disappointed, and to add because I waited so long to unpack and wash, I missed the return date.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Soft and really nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and it is really soft, the comforter is a nice weight but not lightweight. Living in the Midwest it will be perfect in the winter. I wasn’t sure for the price what the quality would be, but I am impressed with the feel of these sheets they’re very soft! They held up well in the washer and dryer
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E Larney

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bundle for a room redo and it’s good quality! The comforter is very large I purchased for a full bed and it sits low so the comforter touches the ground. It’s also very slippery but holds up well once pillows are placed. Still can’t beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Cabral

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy and I want a set of my own now. Fits perfectly in a duvet slip and doesn’t move around or drag on the inside. Took awhile To look for the perfect set for my sons room and then I Decided to take a chance, and I’m so glad I did. You won’t regret this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wasted my money
customer_reviews.text: Would be a great comforter but straight out of the package the seems on the comforter were loose and the material in the comforter creates fuzz balls all over the sheets and pajamas and makes the comforter un-usable.
customer_reviews.author: L.Perez

customer_reviews.title: Stop searching and BUY THIS PRODUCT you’ll not be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was spending a lot of time scrolling Amazon for a bed set for my boyfriend. I came across this one a saw it’s reciews. Not to mention the unbeatable price. I can’t say enough good things about this set. I’m going to get myself a set too. It came vacuumed sealed and when I cut the wrapping open it expanded and is a thick, dense comforter as well as soft sheets and pillow cases. I can’t get over how shoft and comfortable it all is. Definitely recommending this brand to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: b. garrett

customer_reviews.title: Good for business
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 bnb’s These were the best sheets. I buy sheets from other discount and thrift stores and have to check sizes and of course wear or stains but these although slightly more money where perfect with tags to show the end or side on the bottom sheet great help. I
customer_reviews.author: Susan Marsh

customer_reviews.title: not very comfortable UPDATED:
customer_reviews.text: i’m not sure what i expected but the comforter itself isn’t very soft or fluffy, it’s quite flat and borderline uncomfortable feeling. the sheets aren’t very soft either, but they’re livable. i put three starts because it’s doable if you don’t have anything else. i’ll update this if i end up changing my mind. UPDATE: i’ve grown to love this set. i washed it, and compared it to my 100$ down comforter and i’m in love. it’s 10x better than my comforter. very soft. the sheets i’m still not super impressed with, but the comforter is for sure the best part
customer_reviews.author: lex

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and light weight.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this comforter set. Very light weight and both my husband and I love the sheet set being a different color than the comforter. The colors are very agreeable no matter who you I identify as. This was a great find. It’s been in my cart for awhile and I’m so glad I tapped buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Comforter, Horrible sheets
customer_reviews.text: The comforter was great. It is a nice color blue and is very comfortable. But the sheets that come with the set are horrible. The elastic broke on the fitted sheet and the material is rough. My wife and I slept on it the first night and did not have a great experience. If the comforter was sold separately, this would have been a better purchase.
customer_reviews.author: William Ballentine

customer_reviews.title: Poor stitching
customer_reviews.text: It is soft, lightweight, and comfortable but the stitching is super poor quality. I honestly expect it to start falling apart very soon as many of the stitches are starting to unravel already. Sheets and pillow cases are nice though. I guess I should have read the description better because it doesn't come with a bed skirt either.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey Redmon

customer_reviews.title: Was really surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I’m really picky with how sheets feel, was somewhat skeptical purchasing these. I am really surprised at the quality of this set!!! The softness and comfort is amazing!! I will definitely be ordering more for my other beds. I would absolutely recommend. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kmontgomery

customer_reviews.title: Better Quality than other sets in this price range
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are so much better quality than other sheets in this price range, and the comforter os more poofy and fluffy and very soft! I'm jealous of my son's bedding now! I think I need to buy a set (in more feminine color) for myself!!!
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I was really worried about ordering another bed in a bag because the sheets usually are poor quality but, I needed something quick. I am beyond satisfied with this whole set!! The sheets are great quality and super comfortable! The comforter isn’t too thick and not thin at all PLUS super soft! I would order this again in other colors for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Deligthfully soft
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is sooo soft. The fitted sheet has very deep pockets, actually deeper than my mattress so they didn't fit tight but that is the only drawback for me. I can't stand foot wrinkles so others may not have that same issue. They arrived when expected and were packaged conveniently. The comforter keeps me toasty warm -- altho I'm in CA so "cold" here is 40 degrees. =)
customer_reviews.author: kk

customer_reviews.title: Great bedroom set
customer_reviews.text: My mother in law loves the color and the quality. She is anemic and is always cold. However, this comforter is more than enough for her. She says it is very warm and she has no need to double up. It isn't bulky at all and looks great in her room.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Something melted in it or so it feels
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice but after I dried the comforter it got stiff in the corners like something melted. It also has discolored in some places. Ives only had it for 2 months. I wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: mistydawn74

customer_reviews.title: Loved The Product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this seven piece bed in the bag purchase. I was worried that there could not be seven pieces in a small box delivered. Boy was I surprised when I saw the comforter vacuum packed. In fact my 85-year-old Father loved it as a birthday gift. I surprised him by making his bed with your product and when he walked in, he was pleasantly surprised at the quality and softness of the product. Thank you Joshua! Great product, great service, great company. I will buy from you in the future...
customer_reviews.author: Frankie A

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: had an issue with one of the pillowcases, emailed Bare, and was resolved immediately, great company, product, super comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Emily R

customer_reviews.title: Would give more stars if I could!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I took a chance in ordering this bed set! Everything is so comfortable, the sheets, pillow cases, and comforter itself! It’s thicker than I thought it would be, which is a plus for me because I don’t like thin blankets. It was also affordable for everything it came with.
customer_reviews.author: Cipriana M.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: YOU NEED TO READ THIS!!! Just moved into my apartment at school and thought this would be a great buy buy after washing and drying it, the comforter left a sticky glue like mark on it and then after trying to clean it up by putting it back in the wash, it completely ripped itself apart. Will never buy one again!
customer_reviews.author: Joey Torres

customer_reviews.title: stuffing inside came out halfway through my semester of college
customer_reviews.text: it is soft and comfortable but definitely not worth buying. ripped soon after i bought it and most of the stuffing inside came out
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and super comfortable. This gave my bed another year before I replace the mattress. With the addition of a very good quality mattress pad. Slept like a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M Barton

customer_reviews.title: Did not last
customer_reviews.text: This set was great when I first purchased it. Unfortunately, the comforter lasted about 9 months. After that, the stuffing started to leak out all over the entire conforter! I followed the laundry instructions closely but the quality of this product just did not hold up. If you're looking for a long-lasting and durable comforter set, you should look elsewhere. This comforter did not last at all. Typically, comforters should last years.
customer_reviews.author: MBArchive

customer_reviews.title: False color and size
customer_reviews.text: The color isn't the same as in the picture. It's lighter than in the picture and more blue than gray. Ugly. And the sheet is supposed to be twin according to the description but is a twin/twin XL according to the package, so of course the sheet is very loose and hangs and looks very ugly. I wouldn't recommend because clearly they know the advertising is false and are intentionally deceiving people out of their money.
customer_reviews.author: yeah yeah

customer_reviews.title: I love this set
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! The sheets fit great; deep pockets, and well sized pillow cases. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great all in one complete comforter set
customer_reviews.text: I was actually surprised by the quality of the comforter. I was expecting cheap type of material used, boy was I wrong, This is a awesome one! The blanket is a pretty thick but you can move around easily (I tend to toss and turn alot) and I don't have to beg the sheets to fit on the mattress anymore! Will be great for winter as well. You will not freeze is what I like about it the most, I am definitely ordering one for my little girl very soon
customer_reviews.author: Dora

customer_reviews.title: I was nervous it would be poor quality--, would definitely buy from this seller/brand again
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this. I was nervous it would be poor quality--, would definitely buy from this seller/brand again. Good quality comforter and sheets fit my king bed. Price is great :-)
customer_reviews.author: Jose cortes

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain for the price!
customer_reviews.text: It's difficult for me to go to any store and find Eastern king bed sheets. Paying $70 for the 7-piece set, is a great bargain and the fabric feels really good. I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Siegfried Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Brought for my boyfriend who is a OTR driver and he loves the set. He states it is so soft and comfortable that the dog takes over and snuggle under. The dog love so much that he sleep so peaceful and drools now from sleeping so good.
customer_reviews.author: Tyrika

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and vibrant
customer_reviews.text: Material is very comfortable and colors are bright and vibrant. The comforter is not thick but suitable. I bought this set for my daughter’s dorm room - fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Soft, fluffy and not too warm. These luxurious sheets are very soft, and don't pill. The comforter is very much "cloud-like". It sleeps very cool. I normally can only sleep with a sheet or a light blanket. I can usually use the comforter and a sheet and not be too warm.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent extra long bedding set.
customer_reviews.text: This bedding is incredibly soft, both the comforter and the sheets. This was purchased for a dorm room with full XL beds. The fitted sheet has elastic all the way around so it was very easy to fit this extra long bed. Love the color combination of the blue and gray.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great quality
customer_reviews.text: We received the package a day earlier than expected. The comfort and quality were better than expected too, especially at this affordable price. The bedding set looks great on our bed. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: joshua asher

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my son’s dorm room. The sheets were soft and the comforter was just the right weight for Texas weather. The slate grey color went really well with the navy blue and white accents in his room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thinner than expected
customer_reviews.text: It’s much thinner than it looks so I advise that you look at realistic pictures of customers instead of the one displaced. It’s soft and comfortable I just wish it had much more puff and volume, especially considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this set. It is so soft and comfortable. I recently bought a black bedroom suit so I bought the red set to contrast and it looks great with it. I love getting into my comfortable sheets at night and looking at my beautiful bed during the day
customer_reviews.author: Mindymouse03

customer_reviews.title: This is what a hug from Jesus feels like!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best comforter set I’ve ever had! It came soft and vacuum sealed. I washed it before using and it’s now so hard to get out of bed for work. This was a well needed comforter. The deep pockets fit great also. My bed is a Queen with 12-13 in edges
customer_reviews.author: M. Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: So happy with my purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical on what bedding to buy for my new room, I went back and forth througg different websites and I kept coming back to this set and I’m so happy I did! It’s so comfortable, soft, and warm. The light grey fits my new grey/white room perfectly. I definitely recommend! 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Emilie Genuard

customer_reviews.title: Super warm and cozy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this blanket! I bought it for my 5 year old for Christmas and I love snuggling in his bed because the blanket is so cozy! I want to order it in a Queen so I can have it in my bed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is quality bedding
customer_reviews.text: This bedding set is Very cozy and comfortable. I have it as a birthday gift, and she was so excited to have a new look in her room.
customer_reviews.author: KEL

customer_reviews.title: Colors are true to the pictures.
customer_reviews.text: It isn’t wide enough to hang on my king size. The set is nice and was in perfect condition. It is a little heavier than I thought it would be, but it is gonna feel god this next winter.
customer_reviews.author: William a WrightJr.

customer_reviews.title: reat purchase
customer_reviews.text: product arrived on time. the fit is perfect. looks great on our bed and after our first night sleeping on the sheets I can say that they are so comfortable! my wife and I love them.
customer_reviews.author: r.m. texas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The black is dark grey. I wanted black but customer service was awesome and took care of me right away. The softness of the material is crazy. The price is really awesome.
customer_reviews.author: PTOLMICH

customer_reviews.title: Look nice and washed well!
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves the set! She got two! She loves how soft the sheets are! Wish you sold extra pillow cases...do you and I just couldn’t find them?
customer_reviews.author: Dot

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for in law
customer_reviews.text: This product was purchased for my mother in law. She called up and told us how she loved it. Said it was soft and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Karrie smith

customer_reviews.title: Loved this set
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't think it'd be a soft comforter but it really is and the sheets are really nice the fitted sheet has deep pockets I am very satisfied with the set I bought. Only thing I didn't like was I had to pick of little strings that was all over the comforter not attached just laying all over it.
customer_reviews.author: stacey

customer_reviews.title: My son loves these sheets and comforter so far
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for my 11yr old sons bed. His old sheets were pretty worn and we really wanted to buy him a nice set and were very pleased and surprised at the price and phenomenal quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Hillan

customer_reviews.title: Cheap ill-sewn junk
customer_reviews.text: Cheap garbage. Poorly sewn, sheet & blanket threads were coming out everywhere before washing. Some pockets of comforter weren’t even sewn at all. Literally inches of thread coming off brand new bed set. Probably going to fall apart in no time at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself the favor and buy this set
customer_reviews.text: Honestly so much better quality than I expected. There was no weird smell that fabrics sometimes have. I immediately washed it. And set the bed. I added two red silk pillowcases from another company. But the fabric is VERY soft. The comforter is perfect. Light enough to let some body heat escape so you don’t overheat. Or have to stick a leg out. Heavy enough to keep you warm. I couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: cheyanneM

customer_reviews.title: Great for its price.
customer_reviews.text: Like the feel of the set. I just dont like that the comforter is very easily stained. Even drops of water out the shower creates discoloration on the comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Parker

customer_reviews.title: Love this set!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set, although the sheets are a little more on the gray side than deep black, but it's no big deal at all!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Delivered on tiime
customer_reviews.text: My son is taking it to college. He's not thrilled with the bedding, but said it will do. I'm not exactly sure what that means. I noticed the blanket is very thin, but the sheets seemed okay
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Just washed it and it washed up nice. Is the right thickness, not too thick and not too thin. Great for college. Sheets and Comforter are soft. Pleased with purchase so far. Might buy two more for our boy's bedrooms.
customer_reviews.author: Love Jesus

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money. Too cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: It seemed to be an economical sheet/ comforter set. Both products are very cheaply made. The elastic on the fitted sheet is very cheap. The comforter color is a bright red but the material is cheap cotton; it will be a wrinkled mess in about a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy, love the weight of the comforter, the best price possible for a king sized bed set. I love the color options as well. Highly recommend!! Will be making future purchases from this seller as well when needed
customer_reviews.author: Sami

product_meta.title: Bare Home Bedding Set 5 Piece Comforter & Sheet Set - Twin XL - Goose Down Alternative - Ultra-Soft 1800 Premium - Hypoallergenic - Breathable Bed Set (Twin XL, Light Grey/Grey)
feature_bullets: Luxurious 1800 Ultra Soft Double Brushed 100% Microfiber

EXTREMLY SOFT AND COZY – Bare Home 5 Piece, Premium Bed-In-A-Bag comforter set for Twin XL is everything you need for a dreamy night’s sleep with a luxurious breathable siliconized fiber filling, it is truly all season. Enjoy feeling warm and snug on a chilly evening while still feeling just right the rest of the year.

PACKAGE INCLUDES - 1x Light Grey Twin/Twin XL Comforter (66" x 92"), 1x Grey Fitted Sheet (39" x 80" x 15"), 1x Grey Flat Sheet (66" x 100"), 1x Light Grey Pillow Sham (Standard Size, 20 x 26) and 1x Grey Pillowcase (Standard Size, 20" x 30")

MASTERFUL CONSTRUCTION - Bare Home comforters feature a solid box stitch to contain the fill and prevent shifting or bunching. Piped edges provide a clean and elegant look. Our Luxury 1800 premium ultra-soft microfiber fabric is woven with the finest craftsmanship. Exquisitely designed with a perfect combination of durability and softness.

PREMIUM QUALITY & HYPOALLERGENIC: Breathable, hypoallergenic, and double brushed microfiber yarns provide resistance from dust mites and other allergens, great for those prone to allergies or asthma. You will wake up feeling rested and refreshed every morning. Our linens are wrinkle, shrink, fade, and stain resistant!

30 DAY RISK FREE 100% GUARANTEE: We believe in our products so much we guarantee that you will love them! If you are not satisfied, simply contact us to return the item for a refund. Please see our return policy for details.
